name: Pahal Initiative For Social Change Samiti

address: House No. 01, Street No. 07, Pardeshipura Indore M.P.

briefDescription: PAHAL: Initiative for social change is a registered non government organization under MP Society act. 1976, PAHAL, is the only and first ever organization which gave attention to Government organizations like Observation Home and Special Homes for children, at Social Welfare Complex, Indore. It is a District level humanitarian, gender sensitive and child focused development organization. It operates all over the District of Indore, Madhya Pradesh serving in almost every part of city and covering all categories of children including, Children in Need of Care and Protection and Juveniles in Conflict with law, Children of Street, Railway and marginalized children, youth and women addressing multiple issues and initiating programs.
